title: I've Just Come from the Fountain

lyrics.text:
I've just come from the fountain, I've just come from the fountain, Lord, I've just come from the fountain, his name's so sweet.
O Lord, I've just come from the fountain, I've just come from the fountain, Lord, I've just come from the fountain, his name's so sweet.

O brother, do you love Jesus?
Yes, yes, I do love my Jesus.
Brother, do you love Jesus?
His name's so sweet.

I've just come from the fountain, I've just come from the fountain, Lord, I've just come from the fountain, his name's so sweet.
O Lord, I've just come from the fountain, I've just come from the fountain, Lord, I've just come from the fountain, his name's so sweet.
